title: Payvand Reed's Cabinet of Mysteries
description: In this sequel to Payvand Reed’s Curiosity Shoppe, Brad Johnston assumes his role as the store’s proprietor and decides to carry Mr. Reed’s mysterious idea in a new direction. In addition to selling occult paraphernalia, Brad now holds monthly séances where disembodied visitors are invited to make their presence known.To the shock of those in attendance, answers to some of history’s greatest puzzles are then solved. You never know who will be speaking to you through the spirit board when you enter Payvand Reed’s Cabinet of Mysteries.Will you dare to enter?
author: Jeffrey Buller
